cast.name: 珍妮弗·霍夫曼 Jennifer Hoffman

this_title: Evil by Design: Exposing Peter Nygård Season 1
introduction: The three-part original documentary series features exclusive interviews with survivors, never-before-seen photos and video footage. This documentary dissects the culture and events that enabled disgraced fashion designer Peter Nygård to allegedly abuse his power for more than four decades.
chinese_title: Evil by Design: Exposing Peter Nygård Season 1
